name: Robocoder - Dwarf Mountain
description:
Robocoder is a story driven logic puzzle adventure where you take the role of the Operator Niko!.

Made in Unreal Engine 5!

Great Sound Track.

10 Amazing Hand crafted re-playable Levels (More on the way, Check out the early access section for details)

1 Christmas Playground for Live Link Physics fun! (More on the way, Check out the early access section for details)

Tested to work on the Steam Deck!, Over 4 hours of playtime using our Extreme Battery Saver setting!

Training your logic has never been so much fun!

Niko's job as a Robocoder is to operate his discovery droid through the levels by writing a programs for Mar10.

Develop your logic skills and progress through a hand crafted story driven world on a fantastical adventure like no other.

Compete on leader boards for the best time or least amount of lines for a 5 star run on levels!

Experience the joys and troubles of programming an open loop robot with True sandbox simulations to keep you in the edge of your seat!


LiveLink Playground Real time programming sandbox with physics toys and puzzles!
